programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life. It's an unflinching portrait of a fighter who transcended the sport but ultimately couldn't defeat his own demons. Part 3 of 4.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches.

programme.title: Fight quest
programme.desc: Episode 4: Seoul, South Korea - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Hapkido and the Martial Art of Feet, Hands and Throws featuring Masters Kim Nam Je, Bae Sung Book and Ju Soong Weo.

programme.title: Knockouts!
programme.desc: Floyd Mayweather, Jr. - Oscar De La Hoya.
